meanings.sent1: She carefully resculpts the clay to create a new sculpture.
meanings.sent2: The artist resculpts the statue to fix its broken parts.
meanings.sent3: After a mishap, he resculpts the cake into a funny shape.
meanings.sent4: Her love resculpts his heart, making it whole again.
meanings.sent5: The potter resculpts the vase, giving it a fresh look.

meanings.definition: To alter the form or structure of something by carving or modeling again
meanings.sent1: He resculpts the wood to make a more detailed carving.
meanings.sent2: The sculptor resculpts the marble to perfect the statue.
meanings.sent3: In a playful mood, she resculpts the sandcastle into a new design.
meanings.sent4: Time resculpts memories, shaping them differently with each retelling.
meanings.sent5: The wind resculpts the sand dunes, creating ever-changing landscapes.
